column4: Hello, can anyone help me with this hard drive? No operating system or anything seems able to work with it; it's set as unallocated and sometimes tells me it needs a label. Not even GParted seems able to do anything; it asks me to create a partition table and while I do, it apparently just..doesn't register and stays the same
have you got "Virus Protection" enabled in the BIOS?
that interferes with the MBR and such by making it read-only, which can mess things up
look on the CMOS Setup bits (y'know the menu when you press DEL or F2 or w/e on boot?)
